alert.note: Alert for Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 7:32PM EDT until June 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL COLUMBIA COUNTY... At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Philmont, or 8 miles south of Chatham, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Chatham, Philmont, Ghent, Upper Hollowville, Mellenville, Craryville, North Hillsdale, Arnolds Mill, Harlemville, Pulvers, Martindale, Green River, Buckleyville, Omi and Copake Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
